Food App Project

{/* Carousel Section */} {projectImg.map((img, index) => ( {img?.page} ))} {/* Description Section */}

About the App

This food app is designed to streamline food ordering, featuring a user-friendly interface, real-time tracking, and seamless payment integrations. It was built using React for the front end, Node.js for the back end, and MongoDB for the database.

The app allows users to browse menus, place orders, and track delivery status effortlessly. Fully responsive and optimized for performance, it ensures a smooth experience across devices.

Technologies used include React, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. The app focuses on enhancing user convenience and improving restaurant management systems. Below are images showcasing the app's features and user interface.

); }; export default FoodAppShowcase;
